PO.question: PO05: Which of the following are necessary for the PO to maximize the value delivered by the MVP (select all that apply)?
PO06: When can the Scrum team interact with stakeholders (select one)?
PO07: What is the role of the PO during the Daily Standup (select one)?
PO08: Values are only assumptions until they are validated by users (select one)
PO09: Sprint durations may be modified when (select one)
PO10: Which of the following are common attributes of a Backlog item (select one)?
PO11: How should a PO respond when Developers ask for clarification about a Backlog item (select one)?
PO12: What is Product Backlog grooming (select one)?
PO13: Sprints are a technique to limit work in progress (select one)
PO14: What action should the PO take in the middle of a Sprint when the Developers provide feedback that they will be unable to finish items in the Sprint Backlog (select one)?
PO15: Who can add items to the Product Backlog (select one)?
PO17: Which team member is responsible for managing the Sprint Backlog (select one)?
PO18: The PO is the creator and owner of the definition of done (select one)
